entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Windows.Extensions outerloop test SoundPlayerTests.LoadAsync_SourceLocationFromNetwork_Success failing #62305
  • [wasm] `System.IO.FileSystem.Manual.Tests` failing with `main.js 384:18 Uncaught Error: Can't load ./dotnet.js` on rolling builds #62304
  • [wasm] `Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case04/case04.sh` failing with `FAIL: object and non-object field overlap was not detected` #62303
  • Optimize jump stubs on arm64 #62302
  • Cannot understand the API design of Generic Math INumber.Create[XXXX] methods #62296
  • [API Proposal/Question]: IFloatingPoint<TSelf> is totally base 2 IEEE 1985 oriented. We also need the basics for base10/decimal and other rational/fraction/real like numbers #62293
  • DllImportGenerator conversion code fix should make the containing types partial #62291
    7.0.0
  • jit/intrinsics/createspan_il/createspan_il.sh #62285
  • [Linux, CoreCLR, dbgshim] "AddressSanitizer: alloc-dealloc-mismatch (operator new [] vs operator delete)" on ICorDebugThread::GetActiveFrame() call. #62281
    7.0.0
  • CI Tests Holes Tracker #62276
    Future
  • C# Cannot get default value from System.Type class #62274
  • Regression: Bus error when running PublishSingleFile=true .NET 6.0 app on linux-arm (Raspbian) #62273
  • WPF : Build Fault-Tolerant Composite Applications in .Net 6 #62272
  • Icon.Save(stream) each time returns different results #62270
  • Assertion failed '(op3Reg != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #62267
  • [API Proposal]: Improve the performance of enumerating over interface types. #62266
  • Port MD4 implementation from mono/mono #62265
    7.0.0
  • [Android] Provide the option to use NTLM Authentication #62264
    7.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not enforce request Content-Length correctness #62258

Closed

  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests.CreateChain_RSAPSS failed on rolling builds #61362
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #60157
    7.0.0
  • Concurrency bug with PEReader when loading from FileStream on Linux #60545
    Future
  • TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime(TimeZoneOffset, TimeZoneInfo) for "Africa/Gaborone" shifts offset from UTC+2:00 to UTC+2:10 #62247
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add support to override default event provider name for AddEventSourceLogger #61100
    Future
  • json config file has modified,but dotnet 6 can't reload on change when run in k8s configmap #62004
  • [API Proposal]: Add Unix-specific APIs to register for IO ready notifications on the thread pool #61273
    7.0.0
  • The command "emcc --version" exited with code 1 #62237
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\LoopAlignment\\LoopsToProcess\\LoopsToProcess.cmd #62260
  • .NET 6.0 - ReceiveAsync not working #61228
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.DSACreateTests.CreateWithKeysize_BigKeys(keySizeInBits: 1088) #62261
  • [mono] Generic Default Interface Method crash with Environment.StackTrace #60486
  • [mono] class initializaiton overlap check does not support nested structs with explicit layout #61385
    6.0.x
  • How to get property return type? #59175
    Future
  • Is issue with single instance of HttpClient and DNS changes still actual? #62269
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json and docker image with unicode encoder issue #62152
  • NTLM support in Android #32680
    7.0.0
  • Forward substitution for relops can create new data races #62048
    7.0.0
  • [mono] call GC.Collect(); block the main thread won't resume #62128

PullRequests

Created

  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the passing/returning of small vtypes. #62299
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Mark static boxes as invariant #62298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move FabricBot rules to Config-As-Code #62297
    area-Meta
  • Use GeneratedDllImport throughout System.Private.CoreLib. #62295
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update build pool to macOS 11 #62294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Work around `System.Diagnostics.Tests.StopwatchTests.GetTimestamp` failure #62290
    arch-wasm
  • [Mono] Fix wrong DateTime.ToString() formating when using monoVM and linux-arm #62289
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #62283
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security
  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Finish new code gen approach for RegexCompiler / source generator #62268
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Filter blocks to be used for hiding alignment instruction #62262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert PR #60054: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #62253
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: handle interaction of OSR, PGO, and tail calls #62263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Lock MemeoryMappedFile CreateViewAccesssor call #62288
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Update timeout for sourcebuild (#61436) #62300
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing return in LoopsToProcess test #62284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-maui] Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS #62235
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix StackTrace from a dim and Vtable offsets for static interface method #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use ReadOnlySpan<char> on RegexCompiled engine. #62245
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix some typos in test #62257
    area-System.Globalization
  • Add test that ensures that it's possible to zip a named pipe on Unix #62240
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Fix warnings with recent clang/gcc #62244
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: don't forward sub a volatile read tree via copy #62224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix mono debugger thread block when wait for attach #62175
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Use ReadOnlySpan<char> instead of strings on SourceGenerator engine #62222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61969
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavenge fix #62008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62194
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Port #58410: Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #62207
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #62210
    area-Debugger-mono
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Follow up to universal System.Linq.Expressions #62229
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] more emscripten asserts for debug build of runtime #62254
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Always provide existing version information in `dotnet workload list --machine-readable`, even if no update is available #22882
    6.0.2xx
  • Locking issues with multiple dotnet watch processes with shared dependencies #22877
  • error NU1604: Project dependency Microsoft.Azure.Kus to.Cloud.Platform does not contain an inclusive lower bound. Include a lower bound in the dependency version to ensure consistent restore results. #22867
  • Re-enable test ItShouldShowWarningMessageOnCollectCodeCoverageThatProfilerWasNotInitialized if appropriate #22865

Closed

  • Register subcommand for dotnet nuget trust command #20249

PullRequests

Created

  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 #22875
  • Fix typo in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #22866
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Blazor AoT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 as 1604 goes out of support soon #17260

Updated

  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code cleanup supports all code style rules #58086
  • Ensure Default editorconfig in Visual Studio is the same as the one that ships in the .NET SDK #58085
  • ECUI supports naming styles #58084
  • Intellisense doesn't work on pointers in the context of parameters #58081
  • Source Generators: Graceful cancellation for timing #58080
  • IOperation support for implicit Index/Range indexer over non-array types #58079
  • ConvertNamespaceCommandHandler performs an unexpected Format Document operation #58078
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.ArgumentParsing is flaky #58077
  • Add compiler warning when void delagate returns Task #58076
  • Implementation of extension method causes ArgumentOutOfRangeException #58074
  • AdditionalLocations for CS8618 in DiagnosticSuppressor #58073

Closed

  • "An expression tree may not contain an interpolated string handler conversion" on Querable.Where() #58070
  • Runtime crash due to assigning a null value to a non-nullable reference using null-forgiving operator and using the null reference #58033
  • SyntaxTrivia needs a FunFacts property #58065

PullRequests

Created

  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update OneOffInsertion.ps1 file path #58083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reference new debugger bits #58051
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Update features/rename_ui_rework #58068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove IDE0051 suppression #48245
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix await completion for expression body lambda #58042
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58061
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Add nullability annotation to CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix metadata references declaration #58059
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemoryDistributedCache vs RedisCache inconsistency when a value is an empty byte array, and calling Get #38796
  • Hot Reload: allow *always* restart for rude edits #38798
  • Why does the following middleware works perfectly well in Blazor Server App #38795
  • Interop.Functional tests failing on Debian 11 arm #38794
    Test failures
  • [AspNetCore.Identity] CreateAsync without validation #38791
  • Blazor Debug `Failed to attach to process: Unknown Error: 0x80131c69` #38790
  • Perf regression: single_query #38789
  • Support seeking of BrowserFileStream #38785
    Backlog
  • Blazor - MouseEventArgs.Type property is always null in .NET 6.0 #38782
    6.0.x
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #38780
  • blazor webassembly OnInitializedAsync will call many time? #38777

Closed

  • Github Pages (Blazor WASM): Page returns 404 when using direct links instead of navigating via Index.razor/html #38797
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR C++ Client throws in noexcept function, terminating the program. #38776
  • Consent cookies in Blazor Web assembly throwing errors #38723
    .NET 7 Planning
  • When behind TLS-terminating reverse proxy, static file middleware redirects from HTTPS to HTTP to append trailing slash #38744
  • Better compose/organize/design pattern for all asp.net core developer #35367
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #38772
  • Incorrect completion in Razor when code block is missing closing curly brace #38315
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server side components inside an Iframe does not connect through Websockets #38781
  • Blazor: Two assets found targeting the same path with incompatible asset kinds #38784
  • Install Icon not showing on published WebAssembly PWA .NET application #38364
  • Blazor dotnet 6: OnLogInSucceeded not being hit on RemoteAuthenticatorView #38580
  • [Blazor] Add AoT pipeline on the SDK repo to validate AoT scenarios with automation #36481
    7.0-preview1
  • InputBase doesn't implement Disposable pattern correctly #38742
  • Blazor DynamicComponent does not pass parameters to component if case does not match #38635
  • Release built docker image with unicode encoder issue #38743
  • Nullable issue with RazorPage model #38762
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #38730
  • ARM64 support in AspNetCoreModuleV2 #36519
    .NET 7 Planning
  • This issue has been marked `needs more info` since it may be missing important information. Please refer to our [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#writing-a-good-bug-report) for tips on how to report issues effectively. #38778
  • Custom Claim is null after successfully login with in max15 minutes #38749
  • Multiple jwt authentication schemes are not working #38498
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip h2spec test enumeration on unsupported platforms #38799
    area-runtime
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Fix Missing EventArgs.Type #38792
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update selenium versions #38788
    7.0-preview1
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoding microbenchmarks #38738
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Double source-build timeout #38775
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.2
  • <see cref="DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware"/> #38659
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • IHtmlHelper doc: DisplayTemplates really are under Pages #38735
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • IHtmlHelper doc: what goes into SelectListItem #38760
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add source file names and line numbers to the output of dotnet-stack #2776
  • Native symbols are indexed #2775

Closed

    dotnet-trace
  • Use PEFile instead of clrmd's PEImage #2769

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BoxView in Grid Auto Row doesn't get sized properly based on RowDefinition Height value #3633
  • AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds crashes app when AutoSize is used #3632
  • MAUI Grid renders differently from Forms Grid #3630
  • Null Reference Exception thrown if HotReload enabled #3628
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll #3626
  • "Getting started" MAUI App does not run on Windows #3625
  • Boilerplate MAUI project on a clean 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 install doesn't compile; missing components #3624
  • Adopt possibility to resolve navigation Pages by type #3622
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() on Android leads to FileNotFoundException ('/etc/resolv.conf') #3617
  • Feature parity with Xamarin.Forms on Popups #3616
  • Developing MAUI Blazor Project on VM ware Work station or Hyper V #3613

Closed

  • HTML select does not work in BlazorWebView #1353
  • The RuntimeIdentifier 'iossimulator-x64' is invalid. #2495
  • [Bug][Android] DisplayAlert does not work with NavigationPage #3335
  • [Bug] Tap Gesture ios and MAC #2906
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • Deployment error 0700 when building as Windows app #3542

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix keyboard navigation with modal pages #3631
  • Validate Handler Type getting assigned to View #3627
  • [Android] Changes to improve Border control drawing performance #3620
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • WIP: Add BlazorWebView device tests - DO NOT MERGE #3612
    area/blazor 🕸️

Merged

  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢, area/FlyoutPage
  • Use GetActivity inside AlertManager to get Context #3629
  • iOS set UserInteractionEnabled to true when adding gestures #3623
    area/Xaml </>
  • [WinUI] Get the Window for Initialize WindowOverlay #3608
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3611
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.12
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • WinUI3 Interop for share and file picker #3232
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fixes AL Task error by not trying to embed default resources #3598
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection of type that has custom ValueConverter it's not supported (Cosmos) #26881
  • Ask EF Core to provide a method of replacing parameterization in generating SQL statements #26880
  • UninitializedDbSetDiagnosticSuppressor doesn't work when a constructor is present #26879
  • SqlServerMathTranslator exception #26878
  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initialization to null! #26877
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite SqliteConnection does not support DateTime #26876
  • Is it possible to prevent column renames in migrations #26875
  • Poor useability of EF Core as compared to EF 6 #26874
  • F Core materializes projection property as object with default values #26873

Closed

  • Query: Cursor-based pagination++ #20967
    Backlog
  • Call to public SqliteConnection() in Xamarin.Forms UWP app causes unhandled exception #26882
  • The Collation specified by Sql Server is not supported #26812
  • Support multiple params for `.ThenInclude(...)` #26837
  • Getting started with NRT exposes confusing behaviour. #26859

PullRequests

Updated

  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `sudo` breaks some Linux distro builds using source-build #12634

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ubuntu image #12745

Merged

  • Merge 6.0.1xx to 6.0.2xx #12741

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12743
  • Re-enable web https smoke tests #12739
